mapper.select: /* Adm_TestId.xml - getTestIdSummary */ SELECT EMP_NAME , COUNT(EMP_NAME) CNT FROM rd_admin.tb_admin_test_account GROUP BY EMP_NAME ORDER BY COUNT(EMP_NAME) DESC

select test.emp_no , test.emp_name , test.relation , mem.mem_no , mem.mem_id , mem.mem_nick , mem.mem_phone , mem.mem_state , level.level , level.grade , DATE_FORMAT((select max(session.last_upd_date) from rd_data.tb_member_session session where session.mem_no = mem.mem_no), "%Y.%m.%d %T") lastLoginDatetime from rd_data.tb_member_basic mem , rd_admin.tb_admin_test_account test , rd_data.tb_member_level level where mem.mem_no = test.mem_no and mem.mem_no = level.mem_no order by test.reg_date desc
